Title: Court refuses Kanu’s motion for transfer from Sokoto correctional centre
Summary: Federal High Court in Abuja declined to grant a motion ex parte filed by IPOB leader Nnamdi Kanu . Kanu sought to be transferred from Sokoto Correctional Centre to a custodial facility within the Federal Capital Territory or neighbouring Nasarawa State .

Title: Shallipopi named Artist of the Year at 2025 TikTok Awards
Summary: Nigerian singer Crown Uzama, popularly known as Shallipopi, named Artist of the Year at the 2025 TikTok Awards for Sub-Saharan Africa, held on Friday, December 5, in Johannesburg, South Africa . The annual TikTok awards celebrate creators whose content is created in Africa .

Title: Airlines remit $60.4b taxes, charges to governments in 2024
Summary: IATA said airlines worldwide paid about $60.4 billion in taxes and charges to governments in 2024 . The International Air Transport Association (IATA) said airlines .

Title: Benin army officers taken hostage in coup attempt released
Summary: Two high-ranking Benin army officers taken hostage during an attempted coup were released early on Monday . The government said it thwarted the military takeover with support from Nigerian forces . Benin’s economic capital Cotonou was calm and traffic was calm .

Title: Trump to sign order blocking states from regulating AI
Summary: President Donald Trump to sign order blocking states from regulating AI industry . Trump argues the move is vital to maintain US dominance . “There must be only One Rulebook if we are going to go ahead,” he said .

Title: Fubara to commission 10 mega projects before year-end

Title: Senate urges NDLEA, NHRC to collaborate on amendment to anti-drug law
Summary: Senate urges NDLEA, NHRC to collaborate on amendment to anti-drug law . The Senate has called on the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) and the National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) to work together in reviewing Nigeria’s anti drug legislation .

Title: Life is empty, my wife’s death exposes futility of power – Rep. Abiante
Summary: Rep. Awaji-Inombek Dagomie Abiante said the death of his wife, Agnes Nwakaego, reinforced his belief that life and political power are ultimately empty .

Title: 100 kidnapped students received by Niger governor
Summary: Dozens of 315 students and staff abducted from the school in north-central Niger state are still missing . Dozens of the 315 students still missing in Niger state .

Title: Makinde approves 13th-month salary for workers
Summary: Governor Seyi Makinde of Oyo State has approved the payment of the 13th-month salary bonus for 2025 to state workers . He made the announcement on Monday at the executive chamber of his office, Secretariat, Agodi, Ibadan, while inaugurating the Governing Board of Ladoke Akintola University

Title: US Embassy lifts advisory after failed coup in Benin
Summary: The United States Embassy in Cotonou on Monday lifted its earlier shelter-in-place advisory for American citizens . The advisory adjustment came after an attempted coup rocked the Benin Republic on Sunday, when a faction of soldiers sought to overthrow President Patrice Talon’s government . Title: Oyo distributes welfare packages to 10,000 vulnerable residents
Summary: The Oyo State Community and Social Development Agency, on Monday, distributed foodstuffs and cash gifts to over ten thousand widows, the aged and people living with disabilities in the state . Title: Reps C’ttee summons NNPCL boss over 2021 audit queries
Summary: The Public Accounts Committee of the House of Representatives directed the Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited, Bayo Ojulari, to tender relevant documents and appear before it on Monday, December 15, 2025, over audit queries raised by the Office of the Auditor-General of the Federation . Title: Rivers to inaugurate 10 new projects
Summary: The government said the projects, spanning six local government areas, will positively impact citizens . The Secretary to the State Government, Dr. Benibo Anabraba, disclosed this at a news briefing in Port Harcourt on Monday ahead of the nearly two-week commissioning schedule .
